about_the_game:
In the near future, people managed to create a unified state that does not know wars and conflicts, created humanoid robots with the absence of any vices. However, a group of hackers with an unclear motive hacked the artificial intelligence control system and turned most of the androids into their soldiers, carrying out terrorist acts. State security special agent E-9 is sent on the most difficult operation of her career - to track down and eliminate the head of terrorist hackers, however, in the process it turns out that not everything is as simple as it seems...

Features:
- Game genre: Slasher, hack&slash adventure game
- Various locations from neon night alleys to extraterrestrial structures
- Dynamic gameplay
- Driving futuristic soundtrack
- A huge number of different strike combinations - kill enemies as you want

It is recommended to play on a gamepad

content_descriptors.notes: Fights without  blood, people dying, a little bit abusive language.

detailed_description:
In the near future, people managed to create a unified state that does not know wars and conflicts, created humanoid robots with the absence of any vices. However, a group of hackers with an unclear motive hacked the artificial intelligence control system and turned most of the androids into their soldiers, carrying out terrorist acts. State security special agent E-9 is sent on the most difficult operation of her career - to track down and eliminate the head of terrorist hackers, however, in the process it turns out that not everything is as simple as it seems...

Features:
- Game genre: Slasher, hack&slash adventure game
- Various locations from neon night alleys to extraterrestrial structures
- Dynamic gameplay
- Driving futuristic soundtrack
- A huge number of different strike combinations - kill enemies as you want

It is recommended to play on a gamepad
name: Cybernated

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Recommend playing with a controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or intel core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Recommend playing with a controller

short_description: Near future, state security special agent E-9 is sent on the most difficult operation of her career - to track down and eliminate the head of terrorist hackers, however, in the process it turns out that not everything is as simple as it seems... Hack&slash adventure game.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, German
*languages with full audio support
